channel.title: How do I make it where when you kill an Npc you tele somewhere?
channel.description: Okay well I am currently doing barrows and I need it so that when you kill an Npc, you get teled to the next one.

item.title: How do I make it where when you kill an Npc you tele somewhere?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

NPCHandler class,

Under

    public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) { {

add

[code] if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == $$$$) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = ####;
                            ppl.teleportToY = ####;;
                        }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it where when you kill an Npc you tele somewhere?
